January 06, 2006, at 02:36 AM by 85.105.66.26
Added lines 162-171:
  1. enable color support of ls and also add handy aliases

if [ "$TERM" != "dumb" ]; then 

    eval "`dircolors -b`"
    alias ls='ls --color=auto'
    #alias dir='ls --color=auto --format=vertical'
    #alias vdir='ls --color=auto --format=long'

fi

PS1?="\[\033[1;30;47m[\033[1;30;47m\u@\h:\w\033[1;30;47m]\033[1;30;47m $\033[0;37;0m\] "
